item.title: source code august 30 2004
item.description: Where users and developers party together
item.dc:creator: Adam Curry
item.itunes:author: Adam Curry
item.series:name: Daily Source Code

item.title: Daily Source Code
item.description:
While on vacation in Sorrento Italy, I was inspired by two audio files my download script had 'plopped' onto my iPod. One was an edition of IT Conversations from OSCON, where Robert Lefkowitz discussed the meaning of source code. The other 'program' was Dave Winer's morning coffee notes about the debates between bloggers and journalists.

Today marks the first episode of the Daily Source Code, available through it's own rss feed as an enclosure. [direct download here]
item.dc:creator: Adam Curry
item.itunes:author: Adam Curry
item.series:name: Daily Source Code
